data.actual_result: Numbers aren't shown accurately even when the tab shows little loading circle (refreshing) at the bottom. You can notice the change in a server with many members. (Having no role - prunable)
data.expected_result: Number of members should appear constant and accurate even after switching from landscape to portrait mode and vice versa.
data.short_description: Number of members to be pruned don't get refreshed and shows incorrectly when switching from landscape to portrait mode even after it shows refreshed.
data.steps_to_repro: - Turn on the auto rotation of your device. - Go to any server in which you have ban and kick members permissions (a large server would be better). - Go to settings, members then prune members at the top right. - It will show you the options to prune members who are inactive for 1 day, 7 day or 30 days. Note the number of members it shows that would be pruned who are inactive for 1 day.  - Rotate your device to switch to landscape mode. Notice the number of members are not the same. - Come back to portrait mode, still number of members are not accurate unless you click on the first tab (1 day) and manually refresh the tab.
